intro: Sloanea gymnocarpa, commonly known as the smooth-seeded sloanea, is a member of the Euphorbiaceae family. It is a small to medium-sized evergreen tree native to tropical regions of South America. The plant is characterized by its simple, alternate leaves that are typically elliptical in shape. Its flowers are unisexual, with separate male and female flowers on the same plant. The fruit is a capsule that contains numerous small, hard seeds.
